entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
